titles.title: Urging the Government of the Republic of Rwanda and President Paul Kagame to immediately release human rights lawyer Professor Peter Erlinder from jail and allow him to return to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/8/2010--Introduced. Urges the government of the Republic of Rwanda and President Paul Kagame to release Professor Peter Erlinder from jail and allow him to return to the United States.
